name: Safari Master
description:
A game by nelward
Soundtrack by FrankJavCee

Enter the Safari World... danger, adventure, enchantment, and danger await! Bark, bellow, bemoan, bawl, blare, bray, bluster, and ballyhoo at the beasts on the screen... show the world that you have what it takes to become the ultimate Safari Master by uploading your lets play on to YouTube or any streaming service of your choice!

"The most brilliant piece of art that I have ever seen in my entire life." - FrankJavCee

"This game reminds me of my childhood! I hated my childhood." - Gregg

MAC USERS: requires WINE but it will work. Download WINE here: https://www.winehq.org/

SAFARI MASTER DELUXE EDITION comes with a safari hat and a bag of sand, giving you, the safari master, greater immersion into the Experience.

(safari hat and bag of sand are not included)

Nelward is an inexperienced game developer (sometimes, experience isn't the most important part), but he has far more experienced at making music. You can check out his soundcloud here: https://soundcloud.com/nelward
